title._content: Image taken from page 11 of '[La Roquette. Hommage à Notre-Dame-des-Victoires et souvenir affectueux à tous mes ... compagnons d'infortune. Journées des 24, 25, 26, 27 & 28 mai 1871 ... Cinquième édition, etc.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[La Roquette. Hommage à Notre-Dame-des-Victoires et souvenir affectueux à tous mes ... compagnons d'infortune. Journées des 24, 25, 26, 27 & 28 mai 1871 ... Cinquième édition, etc.]" Author: AMODRU, Laurent. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9225.c.16." Page: 11 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1887 Edition: Vingtième édition, revue par l'auteur, etc. (Appendice.). Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000072135 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
